verbs.description: uprip (third-person singular simple present uprips, present participle upripping, simple past and past participle upripped)

entries.meaning: (obsolete or poetic) To rip up; to tear apart.
examples: Yet, saving Juan, who in manly wise / Withstood the shameful deed, no man was slain; / His bosom was upripped in woeful guise, / And from its habitance his heart was ta'en.
